ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] hey ppl read this  if intrested in equestrielle
ygData.msgSnippet: Cool. I play on The Tribunal. I have a 55 cleric named Conwyn of the guild The Spellbinders. Just got my epic. :-) I also have a few other characters but I
ygData.messageBody:
Cool. I play on The Tribunal. I have a 55 cleric named Conwyn of the guild
The Spellbinders. Just got my epic. :-)
I also have a few other characters but I can't think of their names right
now. lol.
luv,
-Su

> Hey Su, I play on the servers Fennin Row, The Nameless, Luclin, and
Stromm. My characters are-- Fennin Row- Sabyla- Vah Shir Bard, The Nameless-
Lizardbug-Iskar Shaman, Vicktonoli- Wood Elf Warrior, and Froglikedragon,
Luclin- Zinoria- Half Elf Warrior, Satrina- Wood Elf Druid, Gdragcor-Iskar
Necromancer, Ladydragon- Human Enchanter, and Lorigon - Vah Shir ( i
forgot), and finally Stromm-Tierwolf- Halfling Druid, Whitetail- Iskar
Beastlord,and Skullwolf - Ogre ( again i forgot). Well anyway, anything else
you all want to know just ask i will, as soon as i can, get back to you! Bye
bye for now!
> -- Lori
>
